snippet.title: Atari Lynx Longplay - APB - All Points Bulletin
snippet.description:
Full gameplay of the Atari Lynx game APB - All Points Bulletin. The game is noted for being notoriously hard. It is very easy to make demerits. Played is the game until a score of 999999 is reached. Port of the original arcade game, mission the mini game when the APB is caught.

Video presented by http://hirudov.com
